sources.title: Electric Earthquake (1942)
sources.description: A scientist uses an earthquake machine to threaten the city, and only Superman can stop his extortion plan! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/electric-earthquake-1942/

metadata.Plot: An American Indian fanatic tries to extort the return of Manhattan to his people with artificially induced earthquakes. Lois Lane, captive in his underwater hideout, seems doomed by Superman's interference...
metadata.Writer: Joe Shuster, Jerry Siegel, Seymour Kneitel
metadata.Actors: Bud Collyer, Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck
